page.title: 20TYPICAL FAMILY SUNDAY,1985
page.content: 8.15am-Got up 8.30am-Had breakfast,tea,toast,jam 8.45am-Washed,dressed in jeans 9.20am-Played with brother in field 1.30pm-Went home,my Uncle was there 1.45pm-Lunch,Roast beef,potatoes,cab- bage,carrots,Yorkshire pudding 2.30pm-Three friends came 3.00pm-Go to friend's birthday party Gave her a bracelet,20 there Played games,netball,badminton 4.30pm-Birthday tea,chicken coleslaw 6.30pm-Collected home in car 7.00pm-Watched"Dallas"on video 8.20pm-Listened to tapes/records Favourite"Ghostbusters" 10.30pm-Bed time Usually my Mum and Dad do gardening on Sunday afternoons,brother plays football at sports field
